attributes.title: What are you going to change, change is constantly changing
attributes.description:
From the works of Living Enlightenment Master Parmahamsa Nithyananda.
In this clip taken from discourse titled " Change the Unchanging Phoenomenon",  Swamiji  says, no need to change in the outer world nor the inner world.  Continuously everything is changing, flowing, and disappearing.  One understanding of this can bring an enormous healing, rest and straightway liberate you.
The complete discourse could be ordered online at www.lifeblissgalleria.com.
